heading: new 'star wars' trailers on web
subheading: two weeks before episode i: the phantom menace opens in the united states, lucasfilm releases four new star wars trailers on the web. by leander kahney.
author: leander kahney
text: lucasfilm on monday released four new star wars trailers.available from the official star wars site and apple's web site, the 30-second episode one trailers each revolve around one of the movie's four principal characters: queen amidala, qui-gon jinn, and anakin and shmi skywalker.the film's first music video appeared on mtv monday afternoon. it features scenes from the film and clips of john williams conducting the london symphony, which performs the music he composed for the new film. williams wrote the scores for the other star wars films as well.the four new trailers will be broadcast for the first time on national tv monday night.on the web, the trailers are available only in apple's quicktime format. apple said the initial episode one, trailer, released in mid-march, has been downloaded 10 million times, making it the biggest video download in net history.
